## ResourceManager.fetchModel() method

Load a model by ID and track the allocation for reverse lookup.

**Signature:**

```typescript
fetchModel(id: string, scene: Scene, options?: ModelFetchOptions): Promise<ModelInfo>;
```

</th><th>

</td><td>

Model identifier or path.


</td></tr>

</td><td>

[Scene](doc/markdown/./scene.scene.md)


</td><td>

Scene into which the model is loaded.


</td></tr>

options


</td><td>

[ModelFetchOptions](doc/markdown/./scene.modelfetchoptions.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Optional model fetch options.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[ModelInfo](doc/markdown/./scene.modelinfo.md)<!-- -->&gt;

A Promise resolving to the loaded model object, or `null` if failed.
